bio.singa.simulation.model.modules.concentration.specifity

Interface UpdateSpecificity<DeltaFunctionType extends AbstractDeltaFunction>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EntitySpecific, SectionSpecific, UpdatableSpecific

    public interface UpdateSpecificity<DeltaFunctionType extends AbstractDeltaFunction>
    Determines how fine-grained the updates need to be calculated. There are three levels of specificity:
    • EntitySpecific - once for every chemical entity in every subsection of a updatable
    • SectionSpecific - once for every subsection of a updatable
    • UpdatableSpecific - once for every updatable

    • Method Summary
